Sentencas: The ongoing green energy transition is increasing the need for dynamic and efficient Power-to-X (PtX) systems to convert surplus wind and solar power to high-value products.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) technology offers the highest energy conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: However, high degradation and thermal variations that cause thermomechanical stress hinders up-scaling of the SOEC technology.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Here we present a novel operation method that alleviates temperature variations and minimize degradation caused by impurities and nickel migration.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: By rapidly switching between electrolysis mode and brief periods in fuel cell mode, a flat thermal profile is obtained.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Our results thus establish a new, simple way to achieve increased SOEC stack and module size and extended lifetime.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The new operation method enables dynamic operation of large SOEC modules for renewable energy powered PtX systems which could drastically decrease costs associated with production of high-value green fuels and chemicals from wind and solar power.
Titulo: Electrothermally balanced operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells
